content: *granny time scarf* skill level advanced beginner **materials** 2 colors of aran weight yarn and a 5mm crochet hook i used garnstudio drops nepal 50g = 75m / 1 8oz = 82yds stitch marker yarn needle scissors **gauge yardage & measurements** gauge is not important for this project if you are using the same weight yarn your measurements should be about the same measurements without tassels ~ 230cm/90 5 height x 13cm/5 1 width i used three 50g skeins of color a and two 50g skeins of color b **this pattern is for personal use only **
